subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Quikscript extensions to Shavian (or separate script)
msgSnippet: ... Yes. As are all the ligatures. ... No combining sequences. I didn t look at the summary form. Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
messageBody:
On 20 Apr 2013, at 00:42, Nathan Sharfi <bonusfrogs@...> wrote:

> - Upside-down senior-Quickscript NO is the sort of thing that can (and should) be handled by a sufficiently fancy OpenType font, right?

Yes. As are all the ligatures.

> - For 11a, did I miss the combining characters/composite sequences? I'm not sure if EXCITE and EXAM count as such.

No combining sequences. I didn't look at the summary form.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
